FuncDef:
The vpn-id command configures a VPN ID for a VPN Instance.
The undo vpn-idcommand deletes the VPN ID for a VPN Instance.
By default, no VPN ID is configured

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VPN ID.
24-bit AS number:32-bit user-defined index, 101:3 for example. The AS number is an integer ranging from 0 to 0xffffff, and the user-defined index is an integer ranging from 0 to 0xffffffff. The AS number and user-defined index cannot both be 0. Specifically, a VPN instance ID cannot be 0:0.

ExtraInfo: The vpn-id command creates a globally unique identifier for a VPN instance. In CU separation scenarios, to ensure that the same VPN instances on the control plane and forwarding plane have the same ID, run the vpn-id command to manually set the VPN instance ID.
